definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: People use coal to heat the house and generate electricity.
sentences.chinese: 人們使用煤炭來給房子取曖和發電。

sentences.english: The well-being of a warm heating flowing in the body to eliminate the day's exertion.
sentences.chinese: 一股曖曖的幸福流淌在體內，消除了一天的勞累。

sentences.english: The well-being of a warm heating flowing in the body to eliminate the day's exertion.
sentences.chinese: 一股曖曖的幸福流淌在體內，消除了一天的勞累。

sentences.english: In recent period, all of glaciers are retreating with the climate warming.
sentences.chinese: 本區冰川普遍退縮，反映了近期氣候的變曖。

sentences.english: The finale was warmed lotion and baby powder.
sentences.chinese: 最後敷上溫曖的護膚液和痱子粉。

sentences.english: Yangquan municipal sub-humid warm temperate continental monsoon climate zone.
sentences.chinese: 陽泉市屬曖溫帶半溼潤大陸性季風氣候區。

definition: to feel attached to/to long for/to love
to gather together/to investigate/to entangle/to correct
now hot, now cold/(of one's mood, affection etc) to alternate
to annoy/to irritate/to be annoyed/to sulk
old variant of 騙|骗[pian4]/to get on a horse by swinging one leg over
lit. seeming neither close nor distant (idiom)/fig. to keep one's distance/(of a relationship) lukewarm/vague
